thread.title: On board: Ryanair to buy major stake in Laudamotion

title: On board: Ryanair to buy major stake in Laudamotion
text:
On board: Ryanair to buy major stake in Laudamotion 5:11pm GMT - 01:07 
Ryanair has agreed to buy a majority stake in the new Austrian leisure airline founded by former motor racing champion Niki Lauda in a major push on the German and Austrian markets dominated by Lufthansa. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Ryanair has agreed to buy a majority stake in the new Austrian leisure airline founded by former motor racing champion Niki Lauda in a major push on the German and Austrian markets dominated by Lufthansa. Kate King reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IEzurI
